front.title: Simple Packetization and Reassembly for IP/*/IP Tunnel Endpoint MTUs (sprite-mtu)

abstract.t: The nominal Maximum Transmission Unit (MTU) of the Internet has become 1500 bytes, but existing IP/*/IP tunneling mechanisms impose an encapsulation overhead that can reduce the effective path MTU to smaller values. Additionally, existing tunneling mechanisms are limited in their ability to support larger MTUs. This document specifies simple packetization and reassembly for IP/*/IP tunnel endpoint MTUs (sprite-mtu).
